next_questions.name: q8
next_questions.title: Q8
next_questions.title_text: During an average day, when are you inside an SEP field. (Typically work hours). An SEP is something we can't see, or don't see, or our brain doesn't let us see, because we think that it's somebody else's problem. That’s what SEP means. Somebody Else’s Problem. The brain just edits it out, it's like a blind spot.
